features: ✅ 4in1 MAKE UP PRODUCT: primer face makeup, makeup foundation, concealer and finishing powder all in one. Leaves skin looking flawless and matt. Hides redness, wrinkles, lines and dark circles.
✅ SILKY TEXTURE, WEIGHTLESS FEEL: make up texture conceals uneven skin tone for a matt, natural looking finish. Makeup mousse provides light to medium or full coverage depending on application.
✅ EASY TO APPLY: Apply over day cream and blend evenly. Repeat until the desired coverage is achieved. The mousse can be applied and blended with a firm brush, a make up sponge or with the fingers.
✅ FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Mousse adapts to the skin color. Available tones: Deep Teint for medium to deep skin tone, Summer Teint (medium), base shade (light to medium), Porcelain Teint (fair).
✅ VEGAN AND CRUELTY FREE: clean beauty make up product formulated without alcohol, parabens, talc, phthalates. Made in Germany by asambeauty - a company with a decades-long tradition.

What is the best way to apply the make-up mousse? The mousse is ideal for applying and blending with a firm brush, a makeup sponge and even with the fingers. What can I do if my skin seems drier, after application? It is best to care for the skin with a moisturizing serum and cream before spreading the makeup mousse on the face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This foundation is silky smooth!
reviews.reviewText: I love this foundation! It is silky smooth. It makes my skin feel really soft. It does a good job covering facial blemishes too!I have purchased all 3 shades. The lightest shade (I think this is the fair to light skin) is too light for me. It's extremely light. I gave it to my 84 yr old grandmother and it was the perfect shade for her. She loved it!The middle shade was the right shade for my face.The darkest shade was extremely dark but I realized that if I put it on my legs and arms after I put my otc self tanning spray tan on that it made them look really nice! It covered any blemishes that I had on my legs and/or arms (blemishes like freckles, scratches, bruises, etc...).I think that this product line or brand is discontinued but I do not know that to be a fact. They have not announced that anywhere that I have seen. But, I bought there lipstick and now I can not find that color again. I have noticed that they will have a product get low on inventory and then once it sells out, it is gone forever. So, my advice is if you like it like I do then you will need to stock up like I did. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Applies evenly and smoothly—glides on
reviews.reviewText: It is difficult to find a good base that doesn’t settle into the fine lines and wrinkles. I am 73. I was pleasantly surprised at the application’s smoothness and blend.(of course a primer/moisturizer should be applied first) The finished look I attained with the first use was lovely. Coverage is good, not heavy.Packaging was good, the product was not cracked and clumpy as some reviews have shown. Delivery was on date promised. I will definitely re-order when my jar is dry!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thankfully, No allergic reaction to this coverage product
reviews.reviewText: I did love the fact that my eyes did not get irritated. I even used it under my eyes as a concealer and it worked without any bad reaction. No hurting watery eyes. I learned that this product looks and acts better without any moisturizer underneath. It stays on longer and looks better simply alone. I do put my powder blush over it. The result is very nice. I wore it for the first time at church yesterday and I got some compliments. You look pretty today is always nice to hear. Thankyou Amazon for carrying this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new go-to for wrinkle coverage!
reviews.reviewText: I recently reached the age where I can no longer buy basic inexpensive foundation. Three hours after putting my old product on it would have settled into my newly emerged fine lines and wrinkles. This stuff is a game changer. It sits on top, never settling in. Never greasy- and I don’t even have to use my base matte primer anymore! Yes, it clumps if you take too long to put it on. However, the beauty of this product is you don’t need much and it really works best just applying it like you would your moisturizer. With your fingers, all over your face and neck. If I want thicker coverage I use a sponge and do little touch up pats wherever I feel it’s needed. Best coverage ever. I look like I’m wearing no makeup, but I have a full face of foundation in that picture! Matches my skin perfectly- I got the lightest shade they have. BUY THIS. You will never regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I been using this for years and it's wonderful. It gives great coverage. It makes your face look flawless!! Most important it's not heavy. I use all of M. Asam products so I can't say enough about them. Great skin care products!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very hesitant to order this because Amazon warned that it’s a “frequently returned item”. I mustered up the courage to order and WOW am I glad I did. Super light, mousse-like consistency, smells great, thorough and flawless coverage. I just apply with my fingers and voilà. This will be my new go to foundation! I am a natural redhead with freckles, so I ordered the lightest shade, which makes me look a bit too light? Might try the medium shade as well because this product is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars product for light to medium tone skin it is very light in color.
reviews.reviewText: I am a natural redhead with light skin tone neutral this product made me appear very pale like applied cream to face didn't blend felt greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Unpaid Review - Great at first, HORRIBLE STAYING POWER!
reviews.reviewText: I've never written a review on a makeup product. I'm a firm believer that everything works differently, and it's up to the user to trial-and-error for themselves. But I feel compelled to leave one this time because I bought this based on the hundreds of "magical" 5-star reviews. I'm now wondering if these reviewers were bribed by the seller to give 5-stars, whether it be in receiving a full refund after purchasing/reviewing (this allows the seller to be marked as a 'verified purchase' on the review) or one of those "We'll send you a free product if you leave a review!" kinda things. I bought this with my own money. No games.I'm in my late 20's with normal/oily, acne-prone skin. My oiliness is pretty tame, though. The initial effect is BEAUTIFUL. I've never had a face product that made my skin look as poreless, flawless, smooth, matte, blurred.... like a real-life beauty mode. It gives good coverage and has a powder-like finish, making setting powder feel unnecessary. Not to mention, it adjusts pretty well to my skintone. Not an exact match, undertone-wise, but damn near close. I find it applies best with fingers or a stippling brush (don't even think about using a damp sponge... trust me.)The HUGE PROBLEM that apparently, no one out of 8,000 people has experienced, is that effect lasts about 2 hours on me EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. I'm like a scientist when it comes to makeup testing. If something doesn't work well the first time, I'll test different variables. Here's what I tried: (1) primer vs. no primer, (2) setting powder vs. no powder, (3) applying it differently (fingers, brushes, sponge), (4) cream cheek products, (5) powder cheek products, (6) different setting sprays, (7) different skincare products underneath, thinking maybe too much hydration was affecting the wear. Each time, testing products I know and trust.I'm a pro-makeup artist, as well as an experienced blogger who reviews products for a living, and I have NEVER had something wear this badly on me! It's quite shocking. And it has nothing to do with getting greasy; it holds up fine in my t-zone. But within 2-3 hours, the product just disappears from the skin around my cheek area. It breaks down and eats through everything on top of it, the coverage fades, and I'm left with the ugliest, dirty-looking patchiness and uneven skin you've ever seen. And if you're like me and have blemishes to cover, good luck! Those puppies will bleed right through (figuratively, speaking). And after that 2-3 hour mark, the poreless-ness and blurry-skin-goodness taps out. My pores and texture are emphasized, and it looks heavy, thick, and makeup-y. Imagine partying for 2 days straight without sleep... that's how my face looks after a couple hours.So, although the phenomenal reviews will suck you in, just be aware that sketchy stuff goes on behind-the-scenes, and something's not right here. Good luck if you try it, and I hope you have a better experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought my first jar on board of a plane. It is so silky smooth and lightweight! And it has just the right level of coverage to even out the skin tone and mask small imperfections. I love it! I'm on my third jar now :D
Produit facile à appliquer que ce soit au doigt ou au pinceau , très agréable à porter 2 en 1 pas besoin de base de teint je recommande

reviews.reviewTitle: Ich bin wirklich überrascht und sehr zufrieden
reviews.reviewText: Lange habe ich nach einem Produkt für den Sommer gesucht der leicht kaschiert und ausgleicht und einen frisch aussehen lässt ohne schweres Make up zu tragen und sich zu zu kleistern (einfach natürlich für den Alltag) und ohne viel Aufwand am frühen Morgen gerade als Mutter und Berufstätige (Zur Anmerkung ich bin 35 Jahre alt). Bin eher so ein Mischtyp denn einen Tag total blass und fahl mit Augenschatten, anderen Tag mit leichten Rötungen. Ich habe sämtliche getönte Tagescremes, BB Creams usw aus dem Drogerie ausprobiert so günstig aber gut wie möglich da ich eigentlich nicht jemand bin der so extrem viel Geld für teure Markenprodukte aus gibt auch wenn man trotzdem frisch aussehen möchte aber war nie wirklich überzeugt -Zu Hell, Zu dunkel Zu Rot oder Gelbstichig, Dann bin ich auf diese Marke gestoßen und habe mich fast einen Tag mit Rezessionen und Videos zu diesem Produkt schlau gemacht gerade bei dem Preis. Ich war froh das es keine große Auswahl an sämtlichen Farbnuancen gab- so einfach und unkomliziert ohne Geld raus zu schmeissen weil es dann doch nicht passt :-) Heute kam die Lieferung und direkt ausprobiert. Was soll ich sagen?! Ich war total überrascht und begeistert! Wer erwartet das extreme Pickelchen oder Sommmersprossen kommplet überdeckt werden der sollte zu einem anderem richtigen Make up greifen und das wäre ja dann nicht mehr der Natürliche Alltagslook den man möchte! Denn diese sieht man sowie auch Pikment Flecken immernoch ganz leicht aber...werden für mich Persönlich gut gemildert! Es sieht sehr natürlich aus! Die Haut strahlt und man sieht frisch und gesund aus! Der Preis ist erstmal etwas abschreckend jedoch benötigt man wirklich sehr sehr wenig für eine Anwendung (Ich Persönlich empfinde es sehr viel weniger als Handelsübliches Make up) Unter dem Produkt habe ich noch die M.Asam Clow up Creme verwendet die ich gleich mit bestellt habe so gibt es im licht einen sehr schönen schimmer (diesen sieht man wenn direktes Tageslicht oder Beleuchtung gegeben ist) Die Haut fühlt sich sehr zart an und es ist sehr angenehm zu tragen, kein schweres Make up! es verschmielzt mit der Haut! Vor allem Morgens vor der Arbeit einfach wie eine Tagescreme auftragen, was Zeit spart! Ein wenig Rouge und Wimperntusche (muss man aber nicht wer dies nicht mag) dazu und es ist perfekt! Ich war am Anfang etwas skeptisch da der Farbton sehr dunkel wirkte obwohl für hellen bis mittleren Hauttyp bestellt. Es passt sich wie bewirbt wird wirklich sehr schön dem Hautton an und ich muss sagen habe mich nach dem Reinigen echt erschrocken wie Fahl und müde ich ohne diesem aussehe und das Tag Täglich, da ich mich vor meiner Arbeit als Altenpflegerin echt nicht jedes mal schminken wollte :-D . Ich wollte mal sehen wieviel Rückstände es auf dem Gesicht lässt. Habe erst mit einem Reinigungstuch abgeschminkt und es war wirklich mini mini mal etwas , als wenn alles wie eine Creme eingezogen ist, wohingegen ich bei richtigem Make up manchmal echt denke :" Was klatscht du dir da im Alltag (wenn es solche Tage mal gibt) immer rauf?!" Also ich würde es immer wieder kaufen. Noch habe ich meine gewohnte Sommerbräune nicht aber habe mir jetzt schon einmal den Summer Ton bestellt, weil ich denke bei natürlicher bräune ist dieses dann doch etwas zu hell. Ist auf jeden Fall sein Geld Wert!!!
Var är min beställning? Den kom aldrig fram eller skickades aldrig, men enligt amazon är de. Skickade och har kommit fram till min adress.

Ottimo prodotto è una specie di crema colorata in mousse che una volta stesa diventa un cream to powder.Leggerissimo, sulla pelle non si sente per nulla, come non aver messo niente, lascia sul viso una bella sensazione, pelle vellutata, uniforma molto bene lasciando la pelle liscia, perfezionata, pori ridotti al minimo unico accorgimento almeno per me nonostante la mia pelle mista è che devo idratare molto bene il viso prima altrimenti risulta un po’ troppo asciutto e prosciugante io non ho neanche bisogno di usare la cipria perché non c’è nessuna lucidità rimane quindi opaco ma paradossalmente il viso nel complesso è comunque luminoso ma assolutamente non lucidoDevo dire che mi piace proprio tanto unica pecca ma forse proprio perché io non lo setto e volendo essere pignola è che trasferisce sulla mascherina questo per chi come me per motivi lavorativi deve ancora metterla
